tourBios.curYrHigh: Made the fourth hole-in-one of the season when he aced the par-3 eighth hole at the Lanhai Open in late-May on his way to a T57.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: In his professional debut, at the Nine Dragons Open, finished T25 at Nine Dragons GC…The following week, enjoyed his top PGA TOUR China finish when he T20 at the Hainan Open in Sanya. Parlayed a final-round, 1-under 71 into the top-20 outing…Closed his year with a T27 at the Tour Championship presented by CTS Tycoon..
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Made his first PGA TOUR China cut, a T47 at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open…In his next start, was T21 at the Lanhai Open. Was 5-under combined in the second and third rounds…After a T68 at the Earls Beijing Open and a T53 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open, made the decision to turn pro.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Made the fourth hole-in-one of the season when he aced the par-3 eighth hole at the Lanhai Open in late-May on his way to a T57.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T20th in 2014 at the Sanya Hainan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 100th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
